Kindle Experiments

SSH

See: MobileRead Wiki - USBNetwork

Enable USBNetwork, connect the Kindle to your computer via USB, and configure the network interface thusly:

IP
192.168.15.201
Netmask
255.255.255.0

Then connect to the Kindle via SSH (no password):

ssh root@192.168.15.244

Search Bar Commands

See: What commands can be given in the Kindle's search box?

Command Description
;711 WiFi information
